title: Can we take away the death quotes from Azir's soldiers.
body:
Recently, Azir's soldiers have been playing Azir's death quotes whenever they expire.
And seeming you often have 3 or more up at a time, you're constantly hearing "Eughhhh!" "Shurimaaaa" "HEUGH!!" and its driving me just a little insane :)

I thought they'd get rid of it last patch, but its still happening...

replies.body:
Hi Lord Sesshomaru,

Thanks for reporting this, just want to confirm that I did pass this on to the Champions team and they confirmed it was a bug and expected it to be fixed in 8.22. So if you're still noticing this issue after the latest patch please let me know and I'll follow up with them again.

Cheers

Haven't really noticed it. But here are some alternatives that I believe would suit well

"I will serve in the next life"

OR 

"For Shurima"

OR 

"For the Emperor"

OR

"I have served Shurima"

OR

"I now rest"

Of course these are just my opinion.
Agreed, but they should definitely have their own VO and not just a copy/paste of Azir's. :P

True.

It'd be nice, but then again they are NPC's (if you know what I mean, they are playable, but not as important as a champion).

For me, it'd be either their own voice, or no voice at all.
Theres no reason for them to have Azir's.

It's like Maokai's saplings speaking just like him.
I turned of character voices after playing about 2 games of League
Evidently you didn't play Aurelion Sol.

alot of champions have the same bug right now, for instance shaco boxes plays Shaco's death sfx. I have also heard Tibbers doing it for Annie but that one seems rare, I haven't been able to recreate that one, it's a little confusing tbh though hearing a big molten demon bear making the same death sounds as a little girl.

It's also global and annoying.
